Needs to develop a Data solution for your business?
DataSwarm provides the easy way to do it

DataSwarm offers a distribution of Apache Zeppelin Notebook with more interpreters and clusters managment among other features that provides data scientists the right tool to do big data analysis for their business.

Big Data Science Tool

About

DataSwarm

The aim of DataSwarm is provide a tool to make big data analysis. User can easily create, resize or remove clusters for processing data and combine several languajes to analize and visualise data. Also they can share their work and create workflows to be execute when they want.

Around the Web

DataSwarm

Be the change that you wish to see in the world

Copyright © DataSwarm 2015

DataSwarm Notebook

This is a multipurpose area: allows data scientists to perform analysis and proof of concepts quickly. They can also share results and save them for reuse. It is based on Zeppelin Notebook.
Notebooks can be shared, save versions using gist and can be set to excecute at specific time recursively. Also paragraphs included on notebooks can be published into external web pages and can be saves as jobs.

Infraestructure

DataSwarm allows the manipulation of infrastructure for massive data analysis. You can create, resize or remove clusters.

Interpreters

DataSwarm offers the posibility of write code in diferent languages. We extends Apache Zeppeling Multi Language Backend to includes more interpreters

Apache Zeppelin Multi Language Backend

Current languages included in the Zeppelin interpreter are: Scala(with Apache Spark), Python(with Apache Spark), SparkSQL, Hive, Markdown and Shell

DataSwarm interpreters

Includes Redshift querying, R language and Luigi workflows.

Versions Control

Track your notebooks versions. Socialice (or not) your code, but has full control of it.

Workflows

Notebooks can be save as Jobs and those jobs can be used into a workflow

Data Science Tool

Dataswarm can be used as Data Analisys Tool. Allows create a Data Science team with several roles: data scientist, viewer. Notebooks can be shared between different users.
